founders.name: Jose Bethancourt, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO @ Method. 2x Founder (1 exit!). Previously at Foreflight and Clover. Studied Computer Science and Business at UT Austin.

# The future of financial account connectivity
Method provides connectivity to consumer credit and liability accounts, enabling end-to-end refinance experiences, real-time account data access, and one-click checkout.
[Book a demo](https://methodfi.com/<./book-a-demo>)

###### One Auth
Verify and connect your user’s **credit and liability accounts** across 10,000+ FIs with just their phone.
###### Stable connectivity
Access **up-to-date information** with **evergreen connections** across all types of liability accounts.
Get enriched data on liabilities from **15,000+ financial institutions**. Every major financial institution is included.
###### Reduce security overhead
Never collect **sensitive credentials or account** **information** with Method handling data security and privacy compliance.
DATA
## Up-to-date data, directly from the source
Credit Report data is no longer the standard. We connect you directly to every system of record for a real-time view of your users' financial accounts.

###### Complete Coverage
Access **every financial account** including student loans, credit cards, personal loans, auto loans, and more **with a single auth**.
###### Comprehensive, Real-Time Data
Retrieve **up-to-date information** including balances, transactions, due dates, payoff quotes, credit limit, APR ranges, and more.
Get enriched data on liabilities from **15,000+ financial institutions**. Every major financial institution is included.
###### Instant Alerts and Attributes
Receive **push notifications** for balance changes, new accounts, delinquency, and **100+ other data points.**
PAY
#### Embed liability and bill payment into your experience
Initiate payments to every financial institution and biller in the US—no manual account numbers, payoff amounts, or instructions required.
Real-time payment settlement, reduced compliance hurdles, and instant payment confirmations.
Balance Transfer
Enable users to refinance or consolidate debt by transferring balances across FIs.
Loan Payoff
Empower users to clear balances on student, auto, personal loans, and more.
Bill Pay
Manage payments on common recurring bills like credit cards, student loans, and mortgages.

generated_description:
**Method Financial: Bridging Consumer Liabilities and Financial Services**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Austin, TX, Method Financial is a thriving fintech startup that aims to revolutionize how we connect with our financial obligations. With a focused mission on providing a financial connectivity API for consumer liabilities, Method is all about creating seamless, end-to-end experiences for refinance, account data access, and checkout processes.

The inspiration behind Method started with a simple idea: consumers should have effortless access to their credit and liability accounts. This translates into real-time updates and quick cash payments, minimizing the friction that usually comes with managing financial accounts. Notably, they’ve attracted attention and investment, recently raising a substantial $42 million in Series B funding led by Emergence Capital.

Part of Y Combinator Batch S19, Method currently boasts a team of about 31 employees. Their work is categorized under fintech, SaaS, and B2B, indicating a robust focus on business solutions rather than just consumer-facing products. They cater to various financial actors—lenders, banks, credit unions, and even healthcare employers—all of whom rely on Method’s powerful API for better customer experiences.

What truly sets Method apart is their emphasis on data integrity and security. By letting users connect their accounts with just a phone number—eliminating the need for sensitive credentials—they simplify a process typically fraught with complications. Their partnerships span over 15,000 financial institutions, ensuring they provide up-to-date insights and alerts directly from the source.

In essence, Method Financial is about more than just technology. It’s fundamentally about enhancing financial agency for users, transforming how they interact with their liabilities. If you’re interested in seeing how Method can streamline financial operations, there’s a live demo available on their website, [MethodFi.com](https://methodfi.com).

In the fast-evolving landscape of fintech, Method Financial is poised to be a critical ally in making financial processes more accessible and less cumbersome.
